short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blacklist check, MX Lookup, DNS Lookup, Whois and other webtools for administrators

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adminkit.net is a web application providing some free on tools like blacklist check, Mx lookup, DNS lookup, Whois, and other tools to help IT staff, system administrators and network engineers in their daily troubleshooting and maintenance tasks.
